name: Keiba Saisho no Housoku '97 Vol. 1
overview: Keiba Saisho no Housoku '97 vol.1 is the third game in the Keiba Saisho series for the Playstation console. In the game the player can only go through different stats of horses, places & jockeys. the game is heavy on japanese text, so only people that can fully understand japanese will like this game.
